computation_notes: Daily aggregation across headlines (mean, std, quantiles)

feature_category: # Total features: 43 — detailed feature list is available in `src/feature_engineering` modules. All technical indicators use strictly historical windows (no lookahead). Entity attribution uses spaCy NER + proximity heuristics.
